LanguageData.ShowInstantMovingIconDesc: Add icon in to icon bar for enable / disable fast moving
LanguageData.ShowFastPawnsTicksIconDesc: Add icon in to icon bar for enable / disable fast pawn ticks
LanguageData.ShowFastTimeIconDesc: Add icon in to icon bar for enable / disable fast time
LanguageData.InstantMovingSmootherDesc: The path from point A to point B is divided into several small segments. If ENABLED, the pawn will move to the end points of each sub-segment. If DISABLED, the pawn will teleport to the end point B! (it is possible to move through closed walls!)
LanguageData.InstantMovingOnlyColonistsDesc: Fast moving only work for my colinists and animals
LanguageData.FastTimeMultiplierDesc: Adds additional ticks for each game tick, 0 = default course of time
LanguageData.FastPawnsTicksMultiplierDesc: Ускорение жизненных процессов колонистов: память, здоровье, нужды и др, 1 = 100%
LanguageData.marksDesc: [%] - percent of base value. 100 = disabled\n[*] - multiplier. 1 = disabled\n[+] - add additional ticks. 1 = disabled
LanguageData.ResetBtnDesc: Reset all settings to default values
LanguageData.RestoreWhenHostileDetected: Restore all settings when hostile detected
LanguageData.RestoreWhenHostileDetectedDesc: Restore all settings when hostile detected
LanguageData.CheckHostileDelayDesc: Check hostile interval in ticks. 60 ticks ~= 1 seconds on 1x speed
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseResearchesDesc: Percent of the base value for researches
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseTerrainsDesc: Percent of the base value for the construction of the floor
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseRecipesDesc: Percent of the base value for craft recipes
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseThingStatsDesc: Percent of the base value for the construction
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseThingFactorsDesc: Materials add an extra amount of work for buildings or recipes. Percentage of the base value of the amount of work
LanguageData.PercentOfBasePlantsWorkDesc: Percent of the base value of the amount of work to do with plants
LanguageData.PercentOfBasePlantsGrowDaysDesc: Percent of the base value of the growth speed of plants
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseTendPatientDesc: Percent of the base value of the treatment
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseFluffyBreakdownsDesc: Percent of the base value of the maintenance buildings
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseMineJobDesc: Percent of the base value of work amount
LanguageData.DeepScannerJobDesc: Percent of the base value of work amount
LanguageData.RepairJobAddXDesc: How much HP adds to a building for 1 repair tick. Default 1 HP
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseHSKCollectJobs: [%] [HSK] Work: Collection of resources(sand, peat, crushed stone, clay)
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseHSKCollectJobsDesc: Percent of the base value of the amount of work to collect sand, peat, crushed stone, clay
LanguageData.AndroidsCraftAddXDesc: Multiplier for the base value of completed printing for 1 tick
LanguageData.RAtomicsResearchMultiplierDesc: Multiplier for the base value of the completed research for 1 tick
LanguageData.RFDrillJobMultiplierDesc: Multiplier for the base value of completed drilling in 1 tick
LanguageData.RFCrudeJobMultiplierDesc: Multiplier for the base value of processing for 1 tick
LanguageData.RFRefineryJobMultiplierDesc: Multiplier for the base value of processing for 1 tick
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseHSKExtractorsMineDesc: Percent of the base value of the amount of work for resource extraction.
LanguageData.PercentOfBaseHSKMineQuarryDesc: Percent of the base value of the amount of work to work in a quarry
LanguageData.SkillLearnMultiplierDesc: For the work performed, a certain amount of experience is given, this multiplier allows you to increase the standard value by X times. Default = 1.0
LanguageData.SkillLearnAllowMax: Change XP values below this limit
LanguageData.SkillLearnAllowMaxDesc: The experience gained for the work will be modified if it is less than this value. If the value is 0, the entire experience will be changed
LanguageData.PawnSpeedMultBeforeCutoff: [*] Speed BEFORE to the Cutoff age
LanguageData.PawnSpeedMultBeforeCutoffDesc: Aging speed multiplier for humanlike pawns younger than the humanlike age cutoff.
LanguageData.PawnSpeedMultAfterCutoffDesc: Aging speed multiplier for humanlike pawns as old or older than the humanlike age cutoff.
LanguageData.PawnCutoffAgeDesc: Age cutoff where humanlike pawns switch from the before aging multiplier to the after aging multiplier.
LanguageData.AnimalSpeedMultBeforeCutoff: [*] Speed BEFORE to the Cutoff age
LanguageData.AnimalSpeedMultBeforeCutoffDesc: Aging speed multiplier for animal pawns younger than the animal age cutoff.
LanguageData.AnimalSpeedMultAfterCutoffDesc: Aging speed multiplier for animal pawns as old or older than the animal age cutoff.
LanguageData.AnimalCutoffAgeDesc: Age cutoff where animal pawns switch from the before aging multiplier to the after aging multiplier.
LanguageData.RjwPregnancySpeedMult: [*] [RJW] How quickly will she give birth
LanguageData.RjwPregnancySpeedMultDesc: How quickly a human/animal/mechanoid will give birth
LanguageData.RjwInsectEggSpeedMult: [*] [RJW] How quickly will she give birth(eggs)
LanguageData.RjwInsectEggSpeedMultDesc: How quickly will give birth to insect eggs
LanguageData.EggHatchSpeedMult: [*] How fast will the egg hatch
LanguageData.EggLayerSpeedMult: [*] How fast will the pawn lay an egg
